character.statement: The doors are locked. The mall must be closed for the night.
Are you here for the night watchman job?
Hmm, not much enthusiasm... but I need to fill this position, so come inside.
I don’t even know what it does, but it’s gonna be so epic!
I can’t wait to get my hands on the new MacGuffin gadget!
I buy every new thing MacGuffin makes. Then I sell it on the Internet!
I got a great spot... but I can never get here before these old people!
This tent is for MacGuffin superfans only!
This line is nothing. I waited for three weeks when they came out with the voice-activated toilet paper.
Feels like I’ve been waiting here for decades!
